title: New Guinsoo Rageblade Change
body:
>  Passive:Basic attacks (on attack) and spell casts grant +4% Attack Speed and +4 Ability Power for 8 seconds (stacks infinitely).

Can you see it? You'll know when you do.

Who will use it?

replies.body:
Yeah, no, not going to happen. Right off the top of my head, Jax, Cassio, Kayle, and Eve would all be brokenly strong with that item.

Hell, you would see Karthus buy Rageblade, sit on fountain casting Q, then press R at 1k AP lvl 7.

So no, IMO, absolutely zero chance that goes live i nthat state.

That change was part of a set of experimental changes - we accidentally sent only a small part of it to PBE. It's certainly not going live in that state - we're not even testing the version that the PBE picked up (we had more changes in the version we tested to prevent the kind of case you're talking about, and even that needed a lot more work).
Is it going to be a part of the changes to Marksman itemization come Pre-Season 6?

Okay except he can.... keep casting Q, and then R.

And penta every time his ult is up. Fountain karthus is now meta.

I can see a quite easy change to this - remove "on cast" from this passive, make only "on autoattack". Maybe some other kind of compensation for spells, but not sure if it's needed.
P.S. (Edited)
I think it can be changed on: "Damaging an opponent with a spell (count once per spell)", something like this.

Well, that was from a while ago now. A Red confirmed the rageblade changes on the PBE were an "oopsie" moment. (See above)

Personally, I don't think we will ever see an infinitely stacking mechanic, because well, if there is any potential to abuse something, the playerbase will abuse it to no end. Lord knows Rengar players have proven this about 5 times by themselves.

Her W does magic damage _based on her AD_. Guinsoo's won't help that the slightest bit except for attack speed. Also MF's ratios are pretty low

It wasn't worth it to build Rageblade before, removing the 8 stack won't make it worth after.

Generally, hybrid MF is hit or miss (and the builds I've seen of hybrid MF didn't have Rageblade.)

That said, it was reverted (and after reading other comments, it was good thing since it would have been ridiculous cheese on many champions.)

I'd like Riot to be more clear about that change, cause as it looks like a random something like nida with guinsoo's will come out of the jungle with 5k ap and 2.5 as and oneshoot you.

Hell, you can make it work with everyone. Get Riven, guinsoo's + nashor's tooth, spam spells until you have 10k AP and then come oneshoot everyone with your autoattacks.
